general.name: Ferdynand Odhiambo
general.headline: Full Stack Software Developer
about: Ferdynand Odhiambo is a Full Stack Software Developer with over two years of experience in the tech industry, specializing in web development, integration engineering, AI, and machine learning. Proficient in Python, Django, Go, and JavaScript, he designs and delivers innovative, scalable solutions, including an AI-driven talent-matching system that optimizes task allocation based on skills and availability. His expertise includes architecting and optimizing databases with PostgreSQL and SQLite, complemented by rigorous testing using FastAPI and Swagger to ensure high-quality, robust deliverables.

experiences.title: Full Stack Software Developer
experiences.description: Developing and maintaining full-stack web applications, working with modern technologies to deliver high-quality software solutions.

education.subject: Advanced Backend Development
education.description: Learning advanced backend development concepts such System and database design, testing, devops and technologies such as Python, Advanced SQL, Docker, Jest, Django, REST framework e.t.c. Applying them in real-world projects.

education.subject: Software Engineering
education.description: Mastering core programming fundamentals using technologies and programming languages i.e C, Python, Git, Docker, MySQL e.t.c.

projects.name: PointaFam
projects.description: A web application that helps farmers and agribusinesses to connect with each other and with buyers.

projects.name: AI Talent Match
projects.description: The application entails an automated talent-task matching system that pairs talent to tasks based on their skills rating and availability

projects.name: LandSnap
projects.description: LandSnap is a Django-based web application designed to analyze land changes over time using comparative image analysis. It leverages advanced computer vision algorithms to detect and visualize differences between two aerial images of the same location taken at different times.
